data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: As we can see from the picture, three men are playing around one yacht by the sea. As for the background, there are clouds in the blue sky and mountains covered with lush green vegetation. It is a sunny day. The water is so clean as the crystal and appears in different colors. In the center of the picture, there is a white yacht, with a man sitting on it. And another man in a striped T-shirt is standing next to a yacht and wearing his diving goggles. Also, we can find the man standing in front of the yacht also wearing diving goggles and holding two big blue flippers. It seems that he just went back from swimming in the sea. It is clear that all these three boys enjoy their time there a lot. This reminds me of the pleasant time spent with my friends in a coastal city after our graduation. In conclusion, this is a picture that reflects the cozy atmosphere. (165字)
